> Actually I meant to ask that how will the Test Runner extract the test
> methods.
> Will it just pick all the methods whose name begins with test??

It's the TestSuite that extracts the test methods from a TestCase.  Take 
a look at the TestSuite code for more info.  And yes, all the methods 
must begin with "test"

-Vladimir
